wikipedia_page.main: Charles Peregrine Courtenay, 19th Earl of Devon (born 14 August 1975), styled as Lord Courtenay from 1998 until 2015, is an English hereditary peer and  barrister. He is a crossbench member of the House of Lords, having been elected at a by-election in 2018.

link_mentions.page: List of earls in the peerages of Britain and Ireland
response: |5.||The Earl of Devon||(1553)||27px||Charles Courtenay, 19th Earl of Devon||
He was succeeded in the earldom by his son Charles Courtenay, 19th Earl of Devon.
